text: What they achieve not for the sake of someone, but only for the sake of themselves - dreams. Many dreams can be fulfilled alone, but there are dreams that, like a hurricane, sweep away hundreds and thousands of other people's dreams along the way. People of any title, people of any rank are burning with love for their dream. The dream feeds them. The dream hurts them, the dream breathes life into them. And she's killing them. And even when the dream is broken, it continues to smolder in the soul of a person. Everyone should at least live such a life in dreams. A life sacrificed to the deity, which is called a dream. Life without a purpose, just because I was born. Such a life is unbearable.
author: Griffith. Berserk
